summary: This module contains a suite of unit tests that validate various AWS Auto Scaling operations using the Moto library to mock AWS services. The tests cover creation and configuration of Auto Scaling groups, launch templates, scaling policies, instance protection, desired capacity adjustments, lifecycle hooks, and related functionalities, ensuring that the Auto Scaling API behaves as expected.
business_intent: To guarantee reliable and correct behavior of cloud infrastructure scaling mechanisms by automatically testing Auto Scaling group management, policy enforcement, and instance lifecycle handling in a simulated AWS environment.
